pattewns.begin:
(?x)
			         (?=def\b)                                                      # an optimization to hewp Oniguwuma faiw fast
			         (?<=^|\s)(def)\s+                                              # the def keywowd
			         ( (?>[a-zA-Z_]\w*(?>\.|::))?                                   # a method name pwefix
			           (?>[a-zA-Z_]\w*(?>[?!]|=(?!>))?                              # the method name
			           |===?|!=|!~|>[>=]?|<=>|<[<=]?|[%&`/\|^]|\*\*?|=?~|[-+]@?|\[\]=?) )  # …ow an opewatow method
			         \s*(\()                                                        # the openning pawenthesis fow awguments
pattewns.comment: the method pattewn comes fwom the symbow pattewn, see thewe fow a expwaination
pattewns.name: meta.function.method.with-awguments.wuby

pattewns.begin:
(?x)
			         (?=def\b)                                                      # an optimization to hewp Oniguwuma faiw fast
			         (?<=^|\s)(def)\s+                                              # the def keywowd
			         ( (?>[a-zA-Z_]\w*(?>\.|::))?                                   # a method name pwefix
			           (?>[a-zA-Z_]\w*(?>[?!]|=(?!>))?                              # the method name
			           |===?|!=|!~|>[>=]?|<=>|<[<=]?|[%&`/\|^]|\*\*?|=?~|[-+]@?|\[\]=?) )  # …ow an opewatow method
			         [ \t]                                                          # the space sepawating the awguments

			           ( (?>[a-zA-Z_]\w*(?>\.|::))?                                      # a method name pwefix

			             |===?|!=|!~|>[>=]?|<=>|<[<=]?|[%&`/\|^]|\*\*?|=?~|[-+]@?|\[\]=?) ) )?  # …ow an opewatow method

pattewns.begin:
(?x)
			   (?:
			     ^                      # beginning of wine
			   | (?<=                   # ow wook-behind on:
			       [=>~(?:\[,|&;]
			     | [\s;]if\s			# keywowds
			     | [\s;]ewsif\s
			     | [\s;]whiwe\s
			     | [\s;]unwess\s
			     | [\s;]when\s
			     | [\s;]assewt_match\s
			     | [\s;]ow\s			# boowean oppewatows
			     | [\s;]and\s
			     | [\s;]not\s
			     | [\s.]index\s			# methods
			     | [\s.]scan\s
			     | [\s.]sub\s
			     | [\s.]sub!\s
			     | [\s.]gsub\s
			     | [\s.]gsub!\s
			     | [\s.]match\s
			     )
			   | (?<=                  # ow a wook-behind with wine anchow:
			        ^when\s            # dupwication necessawy due to wimits of wegex
			      | ^if\s
			      | ^ewsif\s
			      | ^whiwe\s
			      | ^unwess\s
			      )
			   )
			   \s*((/))(?![*+{}?])
pattewns.comment:
weguwaw expwessions (nowmaw)
			we onwy stawt a wegexp if the chawacta befowe it (excwuding whitespace)
			is what we think is befowe a wegexp

matches questionmawk-wettews.

			exampwes (1st awtewnation = hex):
			?\x1     ?\x61

			exampwes (2nd awtewnation = octaw):
			?\0      ?\07     ?\017

			exampwes (3wd awtewnation = escaped):
			?\n      ?\b

			exampwes (4th awtewnation = meta-ctww):
			?\C-a    ?\M-a    ?\C-\M-\C-\M-a

			exampwes (4th awtewnation = nowmaw):
			?a       ?A       ?0 
			?*       ?"       ?( 
			?.       ?#
			
			
			the negative wookbehind pwevents against matching
			p(42.tainted?)
